liveOnly.label: Live Only Mode
liveOnly.tooltip: True if you want it to only run when you are live

permission.label: Permission level
permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

usecooldown.label: Use Cooldown
usecooldown.tooltip: True if you want to use cooldown

useusercooldown.label: Use User Cooldown
useusercooldown.tooltip: True if you want to use user cooldown

cooldownmessage.value: the $command is still on cooldown for $cd mins!
cooldownmessage.label: cooldown message
cooldownmessage.tooltip: cooldown message (you can use $cd as variable for cooldown time)

usercooldownmessage.label: user cooldown message
usercooldownmessage.tooltip: user cooldown message(you can use $username as user)

joinmessage.label: Join Message
joinmessage.tooltip: notify message for participator (you can use $progress as variable for checking counts)

rewardmessage.label: Reward Message
rewardmessage.tooltip: notify message for getting reward (you can use $rewardlist as variable for winners)

restartmessage.value: Dragon is coming! Use $connand to call dragon.
restartmessage.label: Restart Message
restartmessage.tooltip: notify message for next dragon (you can use $command as command)
